story.paragraph2: I have been dedicated to tailoring since 1996 – nearly 30 years of meticulous work with every stitch. This website was built by my daughter to help me connect with you more easily and continue to serve customers with my craftsmanship.
story.paragraph3: Although my foreign language skills are limited, I am always confident in my expertise and passion for tailoring. I will help you own the most beautiful, comfortable, and perfectly fitted garments, so you can always be confident in your work and at important events.
story.paragraph4: I am honored to accompany and tailor for you!

faq.question1: How long does it take to complete and deliver the product?
faq.answer1: Completion time depends on the service type: Custom shirts within 1-2 days, Waistcoat within 2-3 days, and Suits & Veston within 3-5 days. We will provide specific details when you place your order.
faq.question2: Does home service apply to customers outside the city?
faq.answer2: Yes, we provide remote tailoring services for customers outside the city and international customers. You can measure yourself and send us your measurements. When you arrive in Vietnam, simply pick up your items and pay the remaining balance (30% deposit required upfront).
faq.question3: What if I am not satisfied with the product?
faq.answer3: Customers have the right to refuse if the product does not meet the required standards and will receive a 100% refund. We are committed to ensuring quality and customer satisfaction.
faq.question4: What makes Anh Tailor different from other stores?
faq.answer4: Anh Tailor is proud of over 30 years of experience in tailoring. We specialize in handcrafted tailoring, use premium fabrics, and ensure a perfect fit. Reasonable prices and fast completion times are our strengths.
faq.answer5: We are committed to providing high-quality services at reasonable prices. Vietnamese customers can call directly, international customers can contact us via Facebook for English consultation. We guarantee a 100% refund if the product does not meet requirements.
faq.question6: Does Anh Tailor service guarantee quality?
faq.answer6: Yes, we guarantee 100% quality. With over 30 years of experience, we use premium fabrics, meticulous handcrafted tailoring, and ensure a perfect fit. If the product does not meet requirements, we will provide a 100% refund.
